AUNT: The sister or sister-in-law of one’s parent.
COUSIN: The child of a person's uncle or aunt; a first ______.
INLAW: A 5-letter word related to channel surfing.
NEPHEW: A son of one's sibling, brother-in-law, or sister-in-law; either a son of one's brother (fraternal ______) or a son of one's sister (sororal ______).
NIECE: A daughter of one’s sibling, brother-in-law, or sister-in-law; either the daughter of one's brother ("fraternal _____"), or of one's sister ("sororal _____").
UNCLE: The brother or brother-in-law of one’s parent.
